p: Each day 4 samples were taken as given in Figure 1. Prior to sampling, 20 mL of culture broth was discarded. Sampling volume was 5 mL (three samples) or 20 mL (one sample). Samples were subjected to OD 600, dry biomass and sugar concentration measurement. Lipid content and composition were only determined in the 20 mL sample, ammonium content only in the first samples until complete consumption. Feeding of salts, trace elements and carbon source was done 30 min before taking the last sample of the day.
